articles.title: BMW, I am so breaking up with you
articles.description: I’m driving my i4 back to the dealership as my lease is over. I'm surprised to say I can't wait.
articles.author: Connie Loizos

articles.title: Indian grocery startup Citymall raises $47M to challenge ultra-fast delivery giants
articles.description: Indian e-commerce startup Citymall, which focuses on budget-focused grocery delivery for tier 2 and tier 3 towns, said today that it has raised $47
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: U.S. and Indian VCs just formed a $1B+ alliance to fund India’s deep tech startups
articles.description: Eight U.S. and Indian VC and PE giants are teaming up to fuel India's deep tech boom.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh

articles.title: India’s Offgrid raises $15M to make lithium optional for battery storage
articles.description: India's Offgrid Energy Labs has developed proprietary zinc battery tech as a safer, more cost-effective alternative to lithium for energy storage.
articles.author: Jagmeet Singh
